title: Downtown Portland Vibrant Urban Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Daily Drink
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Portland from the heart of the city with a stay at this stylish urban retreat. Just steps from the famous Portland Art Museum and the bustling Pioneer Courthouse Square, this hotel is the perfect launchpad to explore the city's unique blend of art, culture and outdoor adventure.

Explore the trendy Pearl District or take advantage of the hotel's complimentary gear shed, stocked with everything you need for an urban adventure, including bikes, cameras and hiking equipment. Savour sumptious food and drinks at Zags Restaurant & Patio in its lush garden before embarking on an adventure in a city known for its vibrant and eclectic culture.
offer_address: 515 SW Clay Street, Portland, Oregon 97201, United States

title: Riverside Boutique Portland Stay near City Centre with Seafood Restaurant, Bar & Gym
description: Wander the idyllic banks of Portland’s Willamette River and discover charming cottages and stunning suites home to Kimpton RiverPlace Hotel, an IHG Hotel. Just minutes from the city’s centre, feel a million miles away as you sip on your local morning brew overlooking the expansive flowing river just outside the quaint weatherboard building. After long days exploring this vibrant metropolis, unwind at the hotel’s fully-equipped gy or at modern riverside venue King Tide Fish & Shell.
location_description: Kimpton RiverPlace Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1510 S Harbor Way, Portland 97201, Oregon, United States

title: Historic Downtown Portland Escape near Fashionable Pearl District
description:
Treat yourself to an indulgent stay in one of Portland's finest designer hotels, the Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown. An urban sanctuary positioned in the heart of Downtown, just a stone's throw away from the fashionable Pearl District, this is the perfect launchpad for exploring the city, with the very best of Portland on your doorstep - including winding shopping streets, hippie haunts, upmarket eateries and an abundance of natural beauty.

One of the city's first boutique hotels, it's safe to say this historic architectural marvel is anything but ordinary. Housed in what was once the distinguished Lipman Wolfe Department Store, the Royal Sonesta Portland Downtown offers the quintessential Portland experience with its old-fashioned charm and a new-world personality. Share stories over a tipple in the show-stopping lounge, indulge in a menu inspired by Oregon farm-to-table produce at Finch on 5th, be swept away with a relaxing afternoon at Dosha 5th Avenue Spa, enjoy a ride on a Peloton Bike in the fitness centre, or simply unwind in the hotel's thoughtfully appointed guest rooms, featuring bespoke bird wallpaper, custom hardwood furnishings and playful décor.
offer_address: 506 SW Washington St, Portland, OR 97204, United States

title: Heritage Downtown Portland Escape with Game Lounge & Daily Wine Social
description: Graffiti-inspired whimsy meets heritage charm in the heart of this city’s downtown precinct at the boutique Kimpton Hotel Vintage Portland, an IHG Hotel, located just moments from the historic Pearl District and Pioneer Courthouse Square. After days spent soaking up the city’s exceptional breweries and spectacular parkland, return to comforting handmade pasta and imported wines at Il Solito or head to Bacchus Bar for artisanal cocktails, live music and old-school pool.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Vintage Portland, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 422 SW Broadway, Portland, OR 97205, United States

title: Downtown Portland Urban Oasis with Alfresco Restaurant & Outdoor Equipment Hire
description: Experience the vibrant spirit of the Pacific Northwest in the heart of Portland's trendiest district, downtown Portland. Stay among the action moments from the city's celebrated foodie scene and the tranquil Waterfront Park. Explore the trendy Pearl District or take advantage of the hotel's complimentary gear shed, stocked with everything you need for an urban adventure. At the end of the day, watch expert chefs prepare a delicious dinner from the open kitchen or sip on a local craft beer in the lush courtyard garden.
offer_address: 515 SW Clay St, Portland, Oregon 97201, United States
